caption: A young man and a woman entered a castle and found themselves in a dimly lit room. An old man sat there, deep in contemplation with his eyes closed. The young man initiated a conversation with the old man, who appeared to be his father. The father seemed highly dissatisfied, but the young man vehemently defended his actions. As they argued, the woman who had entered with them joined the old man's side. This left the young man visibly shocked.On a beach somewhere, three individuals walked and engaged in conversation. One of them was attempting to persuade the other two, and eventually, he succeeded.
